sample_screenshots.caption: If you lose the sword is thrown back to the Lady of the Lake.
The Treasury Room lets you set taxes and hire an army.
Reading news in the Throne Room.
Moving on the main map. You are represented by a Crown.

title: Excalibur

description:
Rome and the Barbarians is set in the 5th century A.D. when the Roman empire struggled against the barbarian threat. The player takes the control over the empire in an attempt to bring things under control. The game is played on a top-down European map with abstract symbols representing units etc.

The majority of the game focuses on economical aspects. Money from taxes is key, as it is used to pay for troops and bribe barbarians tribes - therefore it is important to read the statistical data which is given on separate menu screens. But of course there is also a military component: uprising barbarians have to be defeated and important cities brought back to the empire. Movement order for units are directly given on the map.
title: Rome and the Barbarians

description:
Armor Assault is a turn-based strategy game which is about tactical tank battles between NATO and Soviets. However, this is not a wargame as each side has only six tanks to manage. The rules are relatively simple: in each round, orders are issued to the tanks and then the orders of both sides are performed simultaneously. Options include movement, setting mines or fire. The latter comes in two variants, either direct fire or opportunity fire which gets triggered when an enemy tank moves by during the movement phase - each tank is restricted to one type per round. The terrain plays a role because it changes the movement costs and can provide cover.

The game comes with six tank types (can be chosen before a match) with certain advantages and disadvantages and twelve scenarios with different victory conditions (mostly to conquer or destroy a certain target). The editor can be used to create more maps and tanks.
title: Armor Assault

description: Colossus Chess 3.0 is a computer version of chess which allows you to play the computer or yourself. The board is viewed from above showing the whole board. All the rules of chess are implemented and there are also a few features included like show best next move, replay a move or switch from the computer to yourself in the middle of a game.
title: Colossus Chess 3.0

description: Gossip was an experimental game designed to model interactions between the player and between 3 and 7 computer players. The player could influence other players by phoning them up and telling them whether they liked or disliked other players. They could also pass information such as how much another player liked or disliked someone. After making a series of 'Phone calls', the game would process the information and adjust the internal model with the player's goal to become the most popular player.

sample_screenshots.caption: I Tell Dan I Don't Like Liz

title: Gossip

description:
Space War for the Atari 8-bit systems is a variant of the classic mainframe game of dueling spaceships.

The two opponents fly around a sun, trying to destroy each other with their guns. Controls follow the Newtonian model established in the original Spacewar!: once accelerated with the thruster, the ship will follow on its course until the thruster is fired in a different direction.

Several options can be toggled: the point limit can be set to 10, 21 or none. The sun in the center of the game can be set to exert positive, negative or no gravity on the players' ships, and the gravitational force can be set in five levels from very weak to very strong. The playfield can be set to either wrap around or to have the ships bouncing off its boundaries, and the maximum speed of the ships can be set in four different levels.

sample_screenshots.caption: First player attacks while the second player is in orbit...

title: Space War

description: Action Quest is an action adventure game akin to Venture. The player controls a ghost whose objective is to traverse different rooms and collect treasure while solving puzzles and overcoming obstacles such as traps and monsters, often making use of the ghost’s ability to shoot projectiles. The game features 30 rooms and 20 treasures. There is a time limit in each room and if the player fails to fulfill the objectives under the allotted time, the ghost dies.

sample_screenshots.caption: Alas, our brave ghost was cornered.
Oh no, we triggered an ambush!

title: Action Quest

description:
You are making your way through the murky depths of the mine shaft when you hear a disturbing sound. Paying no attention it, you step forward. However, in an instance you are completely taken aback as you look behind and see a blazing fireball speeding in your direction. In a splash second, you perform a huge leap towards an opening in the wall. „Phew“, you think to yourself, „that was close!“.

Alien Hell is a top-down survival adventure game which stars a desperate human trapped on the planet Sol III. Inhabited originally by humans, this planet has been gradually taken over by an alien race to exploit the resources of the planet. Because of the harmful effect of the raw materials on aliens, the strange race has decided to use human labour for extraction instead. One day the force field that protects our hero’s jailcell begins to malfunction, and the man dashes toward the exit. That is only the beginning of the nightmare that awaits him.

The protagonist of Alien Hell has no weapons and the only way to survive is to run. Alien guards, fireballs and toxic gas are some of the many things that the player has to avoid. Crystals can be found in certain places, however their utility is up for the player to figure out. There is a choice of difficulty level in the beginning of the game. Harder difficulty levels increase the agility of the enemy aliens and the velocity of many natural hazards. To finish the game, the player has to work out how to escape the labyrinth.
title: Alien Hell

description: Abracadabra is a simple arcade game starring a young wizard who has to collect keys in the maze-filled wizard’s castle while using a projectile spell to vanquish different enemies such as snakes and elves. One of the features of the environment are the constantly changing walls, ie the individual blocks of the walls change their position as you make your way through. There is also a time limit, failing to exit a room under the given time results in an untimely death. A two-player option is available where two players can take turns and see who collects the highest amount of points.

sample_screenshots.caption: Finally I can leave this dreadful room!

title: Abracadabra!

description:
Uczeń czarnoksiężnika (The sorcerer's apprentice) is a platform game. Your character is about to recover all the pages of The Magic Book and some artefacts like Magic Wand and Magic Hat that belonged to your master sorcerer who died during spell creation. You travel through the sorcerer's castle finding what will grant you the possibility to become a wizard.

The game is similar to Dizzy series. You walk through a maze-like castle, collecting objects and spells and using them in proper places.
title: Uczeń czarnoksiężnika

description: Preppie! is a variant of Frogger that takes place on the toughest golf course in the world, the Ninenty Nine, where the player has to retrieve his golf balls. The player starts at the bottom part of the screen and has to traverse first a road full of golf carts, bulldozers and lawn mowers and then a river full of logs and alligators. Each level has one or more golf balls that the player has to pick up and carry back to the starting position. He can only carry one ball at a time so he has to move past the dangers multiple times before a level is completed. Points are earned for each golf ball recovered. As the player progresses through the levels more and more threats are introduced, such as monster frogs and new types of vehicles. There are ten levels in total.

sample_screenshots.caption: Second level - two balls this time

title: Preppie!

description:
Dodge Racer is a Head On variant. The player races his or her car around a circuit consisting of six lanes and has to avoid crashing into another car that races in the opposite direction. To avoid the opposite car, the player has to switch lanes, something that can only be done in the middle of each straight. The player doubles the speed by pressing a button. When at normal speed, the player can only move one lane at a time, while at double speed he or she can move two. On all lanes, there are dots that have to be collected to be able to move on to the next level. The game ends after five crashes.

There are a number of variants of the game, with different options turned on or off. This includes choosing if dots should be restored after a crash, whether there should be one or two computer controlled cars and whether the crash cars can accelerate or not. The game can be played by up to four players who take turns playing. There is also a competitive mode where one player takes control of the crash car and has to hit the other player.
title: Dodge Racer

description:
3-D Red Baron Dogfight/Flight Simulator is a simulation game where the player, flying a warplane, must shoot down an enemy fighter. The player must adjust the angle of his or her plane so that the enemy ends up in the crosshairs, then shoot. If the player takes too long, the enemy can shoot the player's plane down instead. The screen contains navigational indicators, as well as a counter of how many enemy planes have been shot down.

After an enemy is shot down, the player receives points (how many depends on how fast the enemy plane was shot down) and faces another enemy. The player loses points if their own plane is hit. The game has a time limit, and once it's up the score is tallied and the player can restart.
title: 3-D Red Baron Dogfight/Flight Simulator

description: Defensor is a puzzle game. The aim of the game is to remove radioactive waste with a neutralizer. Radioactive wastes are in barrels. An additional difficulty is the elapsed time. Facilitation are: clock, dynamite, and the keys opening the the door. To complete the mission you need to dispose of waste, get a floppy disk and use it on computer before time runs out.
title: Defensor

description: Major Bronx is a puzzle game. As a secret agent the player aims to get the secret plans and blow up the bombs, which are contained in the enemy base. Agent moves tracked vehicle. On the map the player will encounter many elements which hinder the task, such as collapses or time bombs. Fields marked with a vertical bar disappears after coming off. The entrance to the field marked with a minus means failure.
title: Major Bronx

description: Technoid is an arcade game inspired by Arkanoid. Aim of the player is to capture all the tiles with a paddle and a ball. After hitting the flashing block with the letter P the large sphere appears. Catching the sphere allows the player to enter the next stage.
title: Technoid

description:
Przemytnik (smuggler) is a trading game. The protagonist of the game is Kurt von Karnova. After arriving at one of the emperor's planets he was arrested by the Imperial Guard. The governor gives him a simple choice: either Kurt releases the emperor's daughter kidnapped by the rebels or he will spend the rest of his life in prison.

In order to accomplish the mission Kurt has to get funding for the purchase of armed spaceship. For this purpose Kurt has to move around the planets, collect information and trade in goods.
title: Przemytnik

description:
Dwie Wieże (The Two Towers) is a typical platform game. The main heroine of the game is a sorceress and warrior by the name of Iris. Iris plans to connect to the spirit of fire to give up the human form and learn the secrets of the universe. For this purpose Iris must find a transformation spell.

The game consists of four areas: western tower, forest, mine, eastern tower. Iris can collect various items that can be used in a later stage of the game. Contact with the enemy or other deadly obstacle, for example acid, means instant death.
title: Dwie Wieże

description: Global War is a tactical game. The player is the leaders of of nuclear empire and contending with four countries for world domination. The player's task is to bring the victory their own State by the annihilation of the other countries. Each leader can use conventional weapons, nuclear weapons and propaganda attack. A player can do only one thing at every turn. After the end of turn the game moves to the world map to show the activities of all commanders in the form of animations and messages. The game ends when on the battlefield remained the same state.
title: Global War

description: The Jet Action is a vertically-scrolling shoot 'em up. Player is a modern fighter pilot. The aim is to cross the enemy's fortifications protected by turrets and ground troops. In addition to enemy troops pilot must avoid the walls. Contact with the wall ends with the crash of fighter.
title: The Jet Action

description:
Świat Olkiego is a platform game. The hero of the game is in an unknown way transported to another world while watching TV. The aim of the game is to reach Olki. He is located in the Chamber of Oblivion, enclosed in a glass globe. Getting to Olki is the only chance to return to own world.
The player can move in any direction, turn, jump, collect items and use them. You may simultaneously carry only three items. The mission interfere with various creatures that player can only skip or jump over.
title: Świat Olkiego

description: Cyborg is a puzzle game similar to Robbo. The player's task is to get out of the maze full of traps. During the journey the player has to collect fruits, keys and other items shown on the bottom of the screen.
title: Cyborg

description: Deathland is an arcade game. The aim is to free the royal family imprisoned by the ruler of Deathland. Moving character is essential: walking, jumping, crouching, climbing the ladder. The hero can also use weapons to remove any encountered obstacles and enemies.
title: Deathland

description:
Humanoid is a side-scrolling shooter. After the discovery of a new civilization terrestrials sent emissaries to the peace talks. After landing on an alien planet emissaries were imprisoned. Only an old ship called Humanoid has not been captured. Now space vehicle has to break through alien defenses and send a warning on Earth.

Humanoid can move up, down, forward and backward. Subsequent levels differ mainly in colors. Among each level the player fights with the mother ship. In addition to alien breed spaceships appear various obstacles, such as electrical or ground barriers.
title: Humanoid

description: Fatum is a side-scrolling shooter. The game tells the story of the future. Fate of the Great Ora conquered the world. Only one hero can defeat the enemy. The aim of the player is to destroy everything that moves, avoiding walls and make money. Earned cash allow for the purchase of more powerful battleship equipment. Player may change weapon during combat. Weapons are bought in stores encountered on the road.
title: Fatum

description:
Inny Świat is an illustrated text role-playing game. One day principality Core-to-Dome was attacked by hordes of monsters lead by Tharen. The player's task is to restore peace. To achieve the goal player must travel, make money and recruit volunteers to fight monsters.

The main sources of income are found treasures and trade. In the taverns player can hire soldiers, magicians and bearers. Weapons can be bought from armorer, and the goods can be sold and bought from the merchant. The game provides a possibility of bargaining. Each character can carry 30 kg of equipment. Prices are random in different cities, depends on supply and demand at a time.

Player might be encountered by skeletons, werewolves, lizards, dragons and other monsters. The fight takes place automatically. Player may only decide whether fight or run away.

Inny Świat is composed of eight cities, swamps, dungeons, fields, forests, plains and mountains - hideout of Tharen.

sample_screenshots.caption: At the fork in the road

title: Inny Świat

description: The Convicts is a labyrinth game. The game offers fun for two players on a split screen mode. In a galaxy far away lived creatures called Snows. They held the Power Gem. The Lord of the Non-existence called Akron attacked the planet. The crystal shattered into thousands of pieces. Invasion survived two Snows. Their mission is to collect all the shards scattered around the maze of traps and restoration of life on the planet. The task will interfere with moving walls, shooting cannons, missiles, teleporters and hordes of monsters.
title: The Convicts

description: Łowca is a side-scrolling shooter. The aim of the player is to destroy everything that moves. The player should get as many points and lose the least energy. The aircraft can move up, down, forward and backward. To reach the next level you must earn 99 points. The levels differ mainly in colors, number of enemies and their activity.
title: Łowca

description: Tarkus and the Orbs of Doom is a puzzle game. The aim of the player is to collect 24 Orbs of Doom. There are two characters with special abilities in the game. The first character can walk on water, the second character can jump. Only the interaction of two heroes allows to complete the level. After collecting the Orb of Doom both characters must be brought to the upper left corner of the map.
title: Tarkus and the Orbs of Doom

description: Operation Blood is a first-person shooter. The player has to rescue imprisoned scientists. The protagonist, Captain Gamow, faces the enemy in six missions: military base, forest, village natives, the ammunition, internment camp, airport. The game is based on the targeting of sight enemies on the screen. Player can use a rifle, grenades and power ups that appear on screen. During the fight with the enemy, such as soldiers, helicopters and armored vehicles, player has be wary of hostages, civilians or paramedics.
title: Operation Blood

description: Trix is a Tetris variant. At the bottom of the well fall columns consisting of different elements. The same three items disappear when they are aligned in a row horizontally, vertically or diagonally. The player moves to the next level after placing 50 layouts. The elements may be moved only to the side or down.

sample_screenshots.caption: On the left side: next block, score, level, number of blocks

title: Trix

description: Tarkus and the Crystal of Fear is a platform game. The protagonist of the game is a druid named Tarkus. To save the world Tarkus must acquire four Crystals of Fear. For this purpose Tarkus goes to the Land of Lakes. Each of the four lakes transfers to another realm: World of Stone, Crystal World, World of Magic, World of Gold. Tarkus may collect items and create spells, such as fly, armor, freefall, energy, freeze and transport. To create a spell Tarkus has to find the right items and put them in a pot in the World of Magic.
title: Tarkus and the Crystal of Fear

description: Teacher Killer is a text game. The aim of the player is to kill all the teachers in the school. Before carrying out the mission the player must purchase a weapon. Money for weapons can be earned by trading illegal goods. If the player is caught by a policeman he loses merchandise and pays a financial penalty.
title: Teacher Killer

description: Top Secret is an action game. The mission of Captain Kirst is getting through legions of enemies and reflection plants producing the substance PI. Captain Kirst is armed with a gun, but during the mission he can find other types of weapons and extra energy. In addition to the soldiers player will face the armored vehicles and mutant animals. The game consists of four steps: military base, streets, mountains and jungle.
title: Top Secret

description: Turbican is an arcade game. The game takes place in the Dark Court. Turbican is a young spirit. Its role is to collect the five elements of Destruction Spell and use it to destroy the Statue of Evil Spirit. The ghost must leave the court floating on colorful balloons. The mansion consists of thirty chambers on four floors and an elevator. Turbican can walk to the right, left, jump and collect needed items such as keys and spell elements.

sample_screenshots.caption: Second floor chamber 5 fire and spikes
On the way to the Manor

title: Turbican

description: TvT (Tank vs Tank) is a variant of Scorched Earth. The player can activate three indicators at start: wind, gravity and high mountains. At the start of each round players set up tank position, aim the cannon and strength of shot. Hitting the enemy tank ends the duel.
title: TvT

description: Tanks is an arcade game. The place of action is a future where the computer took control of the machines. The player (or players) controlling two tanks must defeat an army guided by the computer. On the game board outside enemy units the player will find a lot of useful and dangerous items such as extra fuel, extra weapons, mines, missiles reflective wall. To move to the next stage player must destroy appropriate amount enemy vehicles. Players can interact or fight with each other.
title: Tanks

description: Tusker is an arcade game. The protagonist of the game is a ninja named Johnny Muzino. An old shaman turned him into a creature called Tusker. Tusker's task is saving his beloved Jane. During the journey he must avoid the opponents. Tusker may use three spells but only once: temporary immortality, extra time, immobilizing enemies.

sample_screenshots.caption: Last few jumps to finish the game

title: Tusker

description: Tactic is a timed puzzle game. The player's task is to set the vertical or horizontal three same items. To complete the mission player may use bonus items, such as teleporters, dynamite, rock blocks, collapses, conveyor belts. Outside the passing time an additional obstacle is the spirit that can kill for example by using a chunk of rock. The game offers a total of 50 rooms.
title: Tactic

description: Speed Fox is an action arcade game. The aim of the player is to collect all the chips from the board. An additional difficulty is two shooting space shuttles moving vertically on either side of the screen.
title: Speed Fox

description:
Speed Ace ​​is a racing game. Players can compete on one of nine motorcycling world tracks such as Anderstorp, Brands Hatch, Daytona, Donington, Jarma, Monza, Paul Ricard, San Marino, Silverstone. Routes look similar, differing only in the location of corners. Player starts from the last position and has to overcome nineteen drivers to win the race.

The game offers the opportunity to play two players on the same computer, using the split screen mode.
title: Speed Ace

description: Lizard is a shoot 'em up game. Planets of the Reptilian System have formed an alliance to conquer the Earth. Each of the planetary systems is governed by a Tyrant Beast and protected by a force field powered by solar panels. To defeat the commanders of the planets, the player character must destroy the solar collectors. To accomplish that, the protagonist must fight waves of enemies that appear on the right or left side of the screen.
title: Lizard

description:
This compilation includes the following titles: * Lasermania is a puzzle game. The aim is to destroy all the alarm system sensors by means of a laser beam and collect sets of storage. The direction of the laser beam can be changed by moving polished steel elements. Players must be wary of the laser switches which detonate ray generator. After clearing the room must accompany the vehicle to lock. The game includes over 50 levels.

  • Robbo Konstruktor is a planets editor to the game Robbo.
title: Lasermania / Robbo Konstruktor

description: Special Forces: Operation Blood II, a first person shooter, is the sequel of Operation Blood. This time the mission starts during the holidays of Captain Gamow. The game is based on the targeting of sight enemies on the screen. The player may use a rifle, grenades, and power ups falling on a parachute. During the fight with the enemy, such as soldiers, helicopters and armored vehicles, player has be wary of hostages, civilians or paramedics. Mission is undefined. Players must kill all enemies and survive.
title: Special Forces: Operation Blood II

description: Super Fortuna is a video game based on the TV game show Wheel of Fortune. Players take turns guessing letters to form a word or a saying. It can be played with up to three players. They have the option of playing with or without computer players giving contestants the ability to go head-to-head in a game against a friend. Players can determine the intelligence of the computer, set passwords, the type of game - tournament or turn-based game - 5, 10, or 15 rounds.
title: Super Fortuna

description: Droga Wojownika (Way of the Warrior) is an arcade action game. The main character is a barbarian called Telven. His task is to find all the Seals. The barbarian encounters on his way goblins, trolls and other creatures. After killing a monster and returning to the same chamber, the dead enemy comes back to life as a skeleton. The barbarian can use four different sword attacks and parry the opponent's attacks.
title: Droga Wojownika

description: Kasiarz is an adventure game. The player's task is to get into the vault of the bank and take a photo as a proof. During the mission player may use only the items found on the site, such as a diamond to cut glass. Players must watch out for photocell triggering the alarm and do not cause noise. Failure means arrest.
title: Kasiarz

description: Digi Duck is a puzzle adventure game with elements of education. The game is to complement with numbers equation displayed at the bottom of the screen. The numbers are earned traversing the maze. The task interfere with monsters, lasers, and dripping pipes. Some places can be reached only after detonated a bomb in the right place.

sample_screenshots.caption: Digit guarded by lasers and enemies

title: Digi Duck

description: Constellation is a space trade game. The player's task is manufacturing, trade in raw materials and speculation on interplanetary exchanges. There are four resources, three products, four planets and the player's base. The player can borrow money from the bank. Changes in the prices of raw materials and products are displayed in the messages at the top of the screen. There are also random events, such as the loss of raw materials as a result of a meteorite impact.
title: Constellation

description: Książę is a turn based historical strategy game, similar to Defender of the Crown. The game is set in Poland in the thirteenth century. The aim is to unite the country. Player can choose one of the four rulers with various features. Ruler has the possibility to support other provinces, dispatch legation, determine the amount of taxes, read the reports of each province, watch the map, create armies, initiate military campaign, build towns or castles and hear with the opposition. In addition the game features a variety of random events, such as the invasion of a foreign army.
title: Książę

description: Rockman is an arcade platform game. The player's task is to collect all the fruits on the board. The task is made more difficult by monsters, stalactites and stalagmites - contact with them means instant death. Convenient for the player is the ability to shoot and various bonuses, such as temporary immortality.
title: Rockman

description: Mission Zircon is a side scrolling shoot 'em up game. Princess Cirzona is due to be married but the grand ceremonial zircon crown has been stolen by the evil Zaals. As the special assistant of the king it is up to you to gain the crown back within 30 days. Dressed in a jetsuit player has to finish 8 levels, killing encountered enemies and avoiding the walls and other moving objects.

sample_screenshots.caption: Level 5 killed by a tongue of lava

title: Mission Zircon

description: Krucjata is a platform game. Agent Hardin arrives in a boat to the island to recover the documents and chest with gold. To complete the task player has to use found objects and avoid forest animals. As a bonus player may find valuable items and extra life.
title: Krucjata

description: Samurai's Game is a puzzle game. The screen is divided into sixty four squares with digits. Black adds points, red subtract points. The first player chooses a line where you can check the box. Winner is the player with the most points after the discovery of all fields. The game provides practice and tournament mode.
title: Samurai's Game

description: Drop It! is a 3D Tetris variant. The player can rotate the blocks in 3D in order to fit them into the pit they are being guided into. The game features three difficulty levels, two sizes of the board, ability to change the speed of the falling bricks and replay mode. Each blocks level has a different pattern on top.
title: Drop It!

description: Incydent is an adventure game. At the bottom of the ocean lies submerged submarine. The task of the player is to leave the cadmium rods into the atomic reactor to prevent environmental disaster. The whole crew is dead. The only means are objects found inside the ship or on the bodies of sailors.

sample_screenshots.caption: Fingerprint tester- player will have to cut somebody's hand

title: Incydent

description: Kult is a side-scrolling shooter. As a result of scientific experiments mutant monsters colonized the planet. The only salvation from the fall is super modern helicopter. The game board consists of: progress bar, number of rounds for each of the four weapons, radar showing the formations of approaching enemies, weapons bay full indicator, gained points and bonuses. The game consists of eight stages, each ends with the final boss fight.
title: Kult

description: Włóczykij is a side-scrolling platform game similar to Dizzy. The main character is reminiscent of an egg. The main way to get around is jumping. The player's task is to collect twelve capsules with the passengers of the crashed spaceship at each stage before time runs out. Moving enemies can be killed by jumping on their heads. Contact with enemies in a different way means instant death and return to the beginning of the stage. The game features five levels.
title: Włóczykij

description: Piekiełko is an arcade game. The player's task is to get out of the maze avoiding contact with the walls, stalactites, stalagmites, flames, geysers, spikes, deadly liquid drops and other obstacles. The game requires a great deal of accuracy - the position of the hero and the moment of movement require almost perfect synchronization.
title: Piekiełko

description: Jaskiniowiec is a side-view action game similar to Prehistorik. The protagonist of the game is a caveman. The task is to reach all the caves and collect food located there. Opponents such as other cavemen, dinosaurs, or birds, and obstacles like spikes, water or fire impede the player character's progress. Contact with obstacles and enemies takes away some energy. The protagonist uses a club to fight enemies.
title: Jaskiniowiec

description: Fire Stone is a puzzle game similar to Boulder Dash. The aim is to collect the right amount of gems (components of Crystal of Power shattered by a magician named Argos) to open the door to the next room before time runs out. In addition to the expiry of time the player will face moving monsters and falling rocks. The game offers a total of sixteen chambers.
title: Fire Stone

description: Dark Abyss is a vertically-scrolling shoot 'em up game. Player is a spaceship pilot. The aim of the game is to get through the hostile area from one side to the other. Contact with the enemy shuttle, enemy ships, lasers, space rocks and other obstacles means fast loss of energy. The ship can move forward, backward, left, right, accelerate and decelerate.
title: Dark Abyss

description: Fire Power is a side-scrolling platform shooter. The player directs the character of commando soldier John Wesson-Smith. Commando is the last surviving soldier from the elite squad. Commando task is to get out of the front line. In addition to foreign soldiers the player must avoid mines and falls from a great height. An additional difficulty is the elapsing time. The game features eleven levels.
title: Fire Power

description:
This title is a compilation of two games: Easy Money* is a platform game. The protagonist of the game is Eddie. His task is to find the hidden treasure in the family castle. Interfering in his mission are various objects in the castle and the neighbor Beni, attempting to get the treasure for himself. In each chamber Eddi has to collect all the coins before time runs out. Between each level the player can purchase a bonus, such as the absence of Beni, skip-level, timer lock, extra lives, increasing the value of the coins, etc. In some chambers keys can be found. Reaching the key means immediate transfer to the next chamber.

  • Honky is an arcade game. The player's task is to reach the Monster who bewitched all the creatures and objects in the land. Contact with them means instant death: the player must jump over them or go under.
title: Easy Money / Honky

description: Frank & Mark is a platform game. During the holidays twin brothers Frank and Mark come across a castle. The owner of the castle was a wizard Rabus. In the old days Rabus dealt with kidnapping people for ransom. Curious about the story, Mark went to the castle and disappeared. Concerned, Frank goes to the castle to find his brother. During the trip Frank travels the castle, garden and underground. To reach the brother, the player needs to collect items and use them in the right places, avoiding encountered enemies and obstacles.
title: Frank & Mark

description: Helix is a platform game. The player's task is to crawl through a hundred chambers of an old castle to free the enchanted magic necessary to fight with the Great Mage of Night. The most important aspect of the game are the keys. Their number is exactly the same as the number of doors and therefore the player must collect all the keys. While traveling, Helix encounters different enemies and obstacles. Some of them can be neutralized with items that can be found in the rooms.
title: Helix

description: MicroMan is a platform game. The action takes place on a planet named Galaxia. The player controls a robot who has to collect all the chips needed to overcome rebellious cyborgs. After collecting the chips on the board the robot must reach the teleporter. The planet's defensive system taken over by cyborgs prevents the protagonist from completing the task. The robot can use various bonus items such as gravity switch or magazine with bullets. The game offers a total of thirty-two levels.
title: MicroMan

description: Kernaw is a platform game. The player's goal is to beat a dragon tyrant. To complete the task, the player must find the magic items which are contained in castle. Magic Wand allows passing safely through the chamber of ghost. Secret passage can only be opened with the magic key. To defeat the tyrant it is necessary to find a fireball. Contact with an enemy means loss of energy. After the loss of life the player is shifted back to the checkpoint. The player-controlled lizard does not use weapons, he can only avoid enemies or jump over them.

sample_screenshots.caption: Ghost and eye - first check point

title: Kernaw

description: Pong is a platform arcade game. The player controls a ball who has to collect five letters needed to create a password. After collecting the letters Pong will be teleported to his native land. The player moves the ball by setting the direction and strength of bouncing. Pong may use teleporters deployed on the planet. Various creatures and obstacles prevent the protagonist from completing the task.
title: Pong

description: Rucu is a puzzle-board game. The goal is to arrange the patterns on the cubes, so that both sides were identical. The cursor can be set horizontal and vertical, blocks can be moved in all four directions. The game offers a total of five levels.
title: Rucu

description: Microx is a puzzle-board educational game. The player's goal is to arrange a set of chemical element atoms into a predefined pattern to make certain substances before the time runs out. The correct pattern is is displayed at the beginning of each level. At the end of each level the game asks a question related to the arranged pattern. Good answer means progress to the next level.
title: Microx

description: Zeus is an arcade platform game. The player plays the role of the ancient Greek god Zeus. The aim is to release Aphrodite kidnapped by the evil Bat. Various creatures and obstacles prevent the protagonist from completing the task. The main weapon of Zeus are jumps and thunderbolts. The game offers a total of eight levels, each ends with a clash with a guard mini-boss.
title: Zeus

description: Jumping Jack is an arcade puzzle-solving game. The player's task is to break all the tiles. The number of lines on the tile represents the number of strokes needed to destroy it. The bomb blew up all the side tiles. The game features also directional conveyors, trampolines or tiles opening and closing the passage.
title: Jumping Jack

description:
This is a compilation of two Arkanoid clones:

  • Muff is classic Arkanoid clone. The player's task is to destroy the wall on the left side of the screen. The player can pick up bonus arrows that contain various positive or negative extras.
  • Drutt is designed for two players. Each player handles simultaneously vertical and horizontal paddle. The winner is the one who will make the opponent not rebound the ball.
title: Muff / Drutt

description: Moscow 1993 is a trade strategy game. The aim of the player is to overthrow communism in the Soviet Union. The player plays the role of the main oppositionist Ruslan Chasbulatow. The game starts in 1991. During the next two years and ten months the player must raise funds to build an army, bribe the generals and propaganda activity. The main source of funding is speculative trading in illegal goods in different cities of the Soviet Union.
title: Moscow 1993

description: Ardeny 1944 is a two-player tactical turn-based strategy game with elements of strategy board games, similar to the Panzer General series. The game is set during the World War II. The players take command of Allied and German forces during the Ardennes Offensive in December 1944. The game is divided into turns, such as construction of fortifications, replenishment of troops, movement of troops, attack on enemy units.
title: Ardeny 1944

description: Grunwald 1410 is a two-player tactical turn-based strategy game with elements of strategy board games, similar to the Panzer General series. The game is set during the late Middle Ages. The players take command of Polish-Lithuanian and Teutonic forces during the great battle of Grunwald on 15 July 1410. The game is divided into twenty two stages, each divided into five turns, such as movement of Polish-Lithuanian troops, firing crossbow, attack on Teutonic troops, movement of Teutonic troops, attack on Polish-Lithuanian troops.
title: Grunwald 1410

description: Streets is a first person shooter. The player assumes the role of a Megapolis police officer named Harry, and shoots enemy gangsters. The game takes place on a single side-scrolling location. The player's task is to track down and kill all the enemies. A new enemy appears every three seconds in the place indicated by the horizontal arrows. The player moves viewfinder to the right, left, up or down. Before the passage of time, the player has to locate the enemy, shoot him or hide. The game offers a total of five levels.

sample_screenshots.caption: The enemy hidden behind the barrels

title: Streets

description: Neron is an arcade platform game. The player assumes the role of Wielgus Nogallus. The goal is to find magic artifacts in the underground of the palace of Neron. Finding all the magical items is necessary to overthrow the rule of evil Neron. Various creatures and obstacles prevent the protagonist from completing the task. Contact with the enemies and traps means a loss of energy. The main skill of Wielgus Nogallus are short and long jumps.
title: Neron

description: Magic Dimension is an arcade game. The game begins in the street with several buildings. The player can visit each building. Inside the buildings, the player finds a variety of items, traps and teleportation devices. Contact with the enemies and traps means a loss of energy.
title: Magic Dimension

description: Deimos is a platform game similar to the Montezuma's Revenge. The player assumes the role of a treasure hunter. The goal is to find an ancient treasure hidden deep inside old castle catacombs. The legendary Deimos Chalice is guarded by hostile creatures and various traps. Collision with an enemy or a trap leads to the loss of energy. The archaeologist can jump, climb ladders and use various items, such as door keys, pickaxe, skull, dagger, energy potions, and others.
title: Deimos

description: Hawk Moon is an arcade platform game. The player assumes the role of smuggler Johnnie. The aim is to find an ancient Amulet. The parts of the amulet are located in the underground city beneath the surface of the moon. The main skill of Johnnie is the ability to long jumps which can be controlled in flight. The ability to precisely jump is very helpful in evading ubiquitous flames.
title: Hawk Moon

description: Around the Planet is an arcade game. After many years of peace Earth faced a new threat from space. The player's task is to find four pieces of an atomic weapon hidden on a hostile planetoid called Squo. The planetoid defensive system highly complicates the protagonist's task. The player can use a jetpack, find an extra energy, fuel or temporary invincibility bonus.
title: Around the Planet

description: Gallahad is an adventure game. The game takes place in the castle and its surroundings. The main character of the game is Tristan. His task is to defeat the sorcerer named Saldar and save the kingdom. Tristan may carry up to five items. A large proportion of items in the game are unnecessary. The player must be careful what he collects because the items cannot be put down. An additional complication is the sorcerer's guards with whom contact means a loss of energy.
title: Gallahad

description: Imagine is a 3rd-Person Perspective arcade game. The main character of the game is the sorcerer Wormthorp. Examining the Secret Power Crystal Wormthorp falls asleep and wakes up in an unfamiliar place. The player's task is to bring the sorcerer back home. The sorcerer has a spellbook, but spells (such as shoot fog, shoot fire, wall key, make door, make step, hawk, light) are acquired while traveling through the castle. The Keep is protected by hostile creatures. Contact with the enemies means a loss of energy. A fall from a high place ends with an immediate death.

sample_screenshots.caption: Two dragons must guard something important

title: Imagine

description: Ortografia is a timed educational game. The player's task is to choose the correct spelling. The correct spelling indicated in the middle of the screen needs to be selected from different choices by using the left or right cursor keys. The game covers with a question mark a part of the word the player needs to decide on. After two minutes the game issues an assessment rate.
title: Ortografia

description: Outris is a Tetris variant for two players in split-screen mode. The game takes place in a space environment. Each round has a different arrangement of the initial bricks and the amount of time tending to zero. To move to the next round at least one of two players must remain in the game.

sample_screenshots.caption: Classic A Walk Stage - game starts with three same stages

title: Outris

description:
This title is a compilation of two shareware puzzle-board games:

  • Gabi takes place in a country called Barbon. The protagonist of the game is a tiny animal known as Gabi. His task is to crack all the nuts between two stones and then place them in the storehouse. After cracking each nut various objects or creatures may appear, such as a helpful hammer or a key and a harmful spider or a spider's web. A surprise item may change to any of these things and it can be destroyed by a nut or a cracked nut.
  • Kuadryk takes place in a country called Kvadryk. The player's task is to destroy the Dragon by moving the magic bricks. On each level the Dragon must be led to all the magic stones in the correct order and then a magic mirror will appear. The Dragon will be destroyed when the player manages to guide it to the mirror.
title: Gabi / Kuadryk

description: ABC is a puzzle board game. The game consists of finding the hidden password on a board filled with letters. The password is set in a line in any direction - to the right, left, up, down, and diagonally. The player has to point at only the first letter by selecting the horizontal and vertical position before the time runs out. For completing a level the player gets a bonus, such as a card game, an extra points, a time freeze.
title: ABC

description: Guard is a side-scrolling space shooter. The player assumes the role of the space fighter pilot in the Galactic Corps. The aim of the player is to shoot down an appropriate number of whole squadrons of enemy fighters. After completing the task the player is teleported to another area. The space fighter moves to the left, right, up and down, it can slow down and speed up.
title: Guard

description: Magic World is an arcade platform game. The aim is to find ten specific pieces of stardust located in the magic world among lots of unnecessary pieces of stardust. The ability to precisely jump is the only weapon in evading the dangerous crabs. Contact with the crabs means instant death.

sample_screenshots.caption: So many of the pieces and only one is wanted
Contact with the crabs means instant death

title: Magic World

description:
This is a compilation of the following games: MAX* - is an arcade game. The main character of the game is a sportsman named MAX. The player's task is to escape from an underground castle. The game features 30 chambers. On each board the player has to collect a necessary amount of indicated items and reach the next level doors before the time runs out, avoiding deadly spikes.

  • Magic World
title: MAX / Magic World

description: Hydraulik is a Pipe Dream clone. The player's task is to close the water cycle by stacking pipes in the right way before the time runs out. For each part of properly laid pipe player receives points. The pipes appear in random order, shown on the left side of the screen. There are a few different types of pipes: straight lines going horizontally or vertically, rotating corners and crossover ones. All of them may be rotated in all directions.

sample_screenshots.caption: Left part of the screen shows next four pipe elements

title: Hydraulik

description: Sidewinder is a side-scrolling shooter. The player assumes the role of the only survivor of a team of agents sent to capture the Sidewinder helicopter. As a pilot the player must escape through the caverns guarded by an enemy security system. The advanced Sidewinder technology costs a lot of fuel consumption. To refuel the helicopter, the player must shoot the fuel pods scattered in various places throughout the caverns. To advance to the next level, the player must reach the landing pad at the far end of the cavern.
title: Sidewinder

description: Liga Polska is a football management game. The game allows the player to select a team of the First Polish League and one of a dozen available coaches. The player as a manager decides on sponsors, footballers transfers, composition of the team, planning tactics for each match and intensity of training. The game features basic match statistics and league table. The match is presented by short comments on the most important actions. The club's finances consist of revenues from tickets, transfers, advertising and expenditure on salaries and taxes.
title: Liga Polska

description: Centurion is a turn-based strategy game. The game takes place in the Ancient Rome. The player starts with one province and one legion. His task is to conquer all the provinces on the map. Each province can be managed by setting taxes, creating garrison and organizing entertainment. Entertainment competitions increase satisfaction and reduces the possibility of the outbreak of the rebellion. The player can raise invasion legions and built defensive garrisons in each province. The army consists of infantry and cavalry. The player has no effect on the battle, which is presented in the form of decreasing number of troops. The only available option is to flee.
title: Centurion

description: Ketchup is a puzzle-solving game. The main character of the game is the ruler of the state turned into a tomato by Lord Warnhol. His task is to escape from the dungeons of the castle. In each chamber there are objects hindering and facilitating the task, such as locking bars and barrels, teleporters, floppy disk (disables the forcefield) or bombs (destroys wall). The players must acquire indicated items and reach the doors to the next chamber before the time runs out.

sample_screenshots.caption: Floppy disk shut off the forcefield

title: Ketchup

description: Knock is a puzzle-solving game. The player's task is to collect all the hearts before time runs out. Unfortunately, the walls of each room have magnetic properties and attracts every moving object. Moving tiles and Knock stop only at the first encountered obstacle. The player has to maneuver tiles and Knock to gain access to all hearts. The game offers a total of twenty-nine levels.
title: Knock

description:
This compilation includes the following titles: * Hydraulik is an arcade platform game. The player's task is to repair pipes damaged by rats.

  • Snowball is an arcade platform game. The player must collect all the bottles and reach the gate to the next level before time runs out.
title: Hydraulik / Snowball

description: Bertyx is an arcade game. In 3090, remains of a lost civilization under the ice surface of the planet Bertyx were discovered. Contact with the research expedition stopped immediately after unfreezing a found alien. Terence decides to send a robot to the ice base. Its aim is to find nine pieces of a computer access card. After transferring data from the computer, the robot has to start the self-destruct sequence.
title: Bertyx

description: Sexy Six is a puzzle-board game. The player's task is to guess the sequence of four images in eight attempts. At the bottom of the screen there are four envelopes. For each of the envelopes the player may assign one image out of eight. The results of the trials are shown on the right side of the screen: bright color is a perfect match, darker color means that the image occurs in a different place.
title: Sexy Six

description: Monstrum is an adaptation of the classical concept of snake games. The player has to guide a pink snake that is constantly moving through a scrolling labyrinth. The player must feed the snake to score points and gain access to the next board, however feeding the snake makes it grow longer. The snake loses a life when he bites its own tail or falls into the skull. If the snake manages to eat all the dots, the level exit will open and allow access to the next level of the labyrinth. If the player will do the job before the time runs out he receives bonus points for each remaining second.

sample_screenshots.caption: Feeding the snake makes it grow longer

title: Monstrum

description: Neuroid is a puzzle-board game. The player has to guide the shapes in such a way as to make them disappear from the board. The selected field disappears with fields located around. In a place where there is no shape appears a new shape. The passage of time and amount of moves effectively complicate the task.
title: Neuroid

description: Dziedzictwo Gigantów is an arcade platform game. The aim is to find an ancient magic artifact in the castle of Giants. The castle is inhabited by a variety of hostile creatures, such as zombies or ghosts. The player encounters a lot of pitfalls as well. The enemies and obstacles take some life energy. The main weapon of the player are the stones and axes. Traveling through the castle the player may find an extra energy, more weapons, gold objects and keys, required to open the doors.
title: Dziedzictwo Gigantów

description:
Whoops! is a timed puzzle board game. The player's task is to empty the screen of all the symbols before the time runs out. The symbols have to be arranged next to each other in certain ways - horizontally or vertically. All symbols move at the same time in the indicated direction until they are stopped by another object. The symbols are divided into two groups. The first group is the bricks, which have to disappear. The second group is the heads. The heads can not be removed from the board. They are the moving barrier between bricks, may be an assistance or an obstacle.

The game consists of a total of 40 levels.
title: Whoops!

description:
Whoops! 2 is a timed puzzle board game. The player's task is to empty the screen of all the symbols before the time runs out. The symbols have to be arranged next to each other in certain ways - horizontally or vertically. All symbols move at the same time in the indicated direction until they are stopped by another object. The symbols are divided into two groups. The first group is the bricks, which have to disappear. The second group is the heads. The heads can not be removed from the board. They are the moving barrier between bricks, may be an assistance or an obstacle.

The game consists of a total of 40 levels.
title: Whoops! 2

description: Problem Jasia (Johny's Trouble) is a timed puzzle board game. The player's task is to create twelve posters of movie stars for the birthday of Johnny's fiancée. Each poster is made up of twenty pieces. The player has five minutes to properly place all the pieces of the poster on a 5x4 board. A fragment of the poster is released from the base placed next to upper left part of the board. Each fragment of the poster may be moved horizontally or vertically. A piece moves in the indicated direction until it is stopped by another object or the end of the board. Each piece of the poster can be returned back to the base. The correct position of the selected fragment of the poster is shown on a separate board on the left. Once in a while the base launches a surprise, such as additional minute, subtracted minute, swapping two fragments, completion of the poster, bomb. The negative surprises should be immediately returned to the base.
title: Johny's Trouble

description: Pyramid is an action arcade game. The aim is to find all of the pieces of an ancient scroll hiding the secrets of pyramids construction. The parts of the scroll are located in the Cheops Pyramid. The game protagonist is Seti from Nubia planet. His only skill is the ability to jump. Contact with the encountered creatures or flames means a loss of energy. To gain access to certain parts of the pyramid the player must look for the keys.
title: Pyramid

description: Boing II is a side scrolling shooter. The story begins when Bert is sent by a queen into exile for knocking off her crown into the bowl of sprout and salmon soup. The strange new world is full of lethal creatures which arose due to dreadful pollution of the planet. The player has a limited ammo amount and possibility to maneuver up, down, left and right.
title: Boing II

description:
This title is a compilation of two timed puzzle-board games:

  • Reverse in which the player must turn the cubes in such a way as to cover the entire board. Indicating a single cube the player flips all the surrounding fields.
  • Misile Action in which the player must place four elements into the indicated destination area. All objects move in the indicated direction until they are stopped by another element of the board. The additional bricks may be used as an assistance, but the player may encounter obstacles as well, such as deadly flames or magnets.
title: Reverse / Misile Action

description: Terminator is a platform shooter game. The main character of the game will be transferred to five different periods of history: Stone Age, Ancient Egypt, Medieval Malbork, Oklahoma City in XIX century, Los Angeles 1993. The player's task is to find the indicated number of the chips, kill the cyborg guardian and reach the next level teleporter. Terminator may use arms and bombs in the fight against numerous enemies, although the guardian cyborg is immune to the fist attack. In exceptional cases, like stuck in place with no return, Terminator may immediately relocate himself to the start position, although this ability is limited to five times use.

sample_screenshots.caption: Way with no return, need to use teleporting skills

title: Terminator

description:
Tagalon is an action arcade game. The player's task is to find the largest possible number of jewels and a key to the castle. The search takes place around the castle and its courtyard. The seeker encounters on his way other knights, peasants and skeletons. The player can find a variety of items, such as a bomb, shield or extra energy. But the greatest skill is the avoidance of contact with the enemy. The player may carry only one item at the same time. Picking up a new object means loss of the old one.
The game features single player mode and two players split-screen mode.
title: Tagalon

description: This is an add-on disk to Sexy Six introducing twelve new girls to uncover.
title: Sexy Six: Data Disk #1

description: This is an add-on disk to Sexy Six introducing 12 new girls to uncover.
title: Sexy Six: Data Disk #2

description: This is an add-on disk to Sexy Six introducing 14 new girls to uncover.
title: Sexy Six: Data Disk #3

description:
This compilation includes the following commercial and freeware games:### Commercial:

  • ABC

  • Cyborg

  • Ketchup

  • Magic of Words

  • Max

  • Neuroid

  • Sexy Six

  • Sexy Six: Data Disk #1

  • Sexy Six: Data Disk #2

  • Sexy Six: Data Disk #3

  • Tekblast

Freeware:

  • Liner!

  • ATASCII Squash

  • Fake Frogger!

  • Mustak Hunters

Unfinished game:

  • Mr. Proper

In addition the CD contains the music files in the format *. SAP and two bonus directories: scans of the original cover and twenty *. mp3 files.
title: Sikor Soft *.ATR & *.XEX Goodies

description: Piłkarski Poker is a football management game. The game allows the player to select one club of fifty four available polish teams. Regardless of the selected team the player starts with the Polish Third Division. The player as a manager decides on footballers transfers, composition of the team and type of training. The financial side of the game is limited to the bank loans, revenue from ticket sales and player transfers. The game features basic player statistics and league table. The match is presented only by showing actual score.
title: Piłkarski Poker

description: Midnight is an arcade platform game. An old wizard Al is going to destroy the Hrkach Castle. As all the servants run away you are now alone. There is only one way to save the castle. The player's task is to make light in all rooms in the castle as AI is afraid of the light. The wizard will arrive within four hours - at midnight. You must pick up the candles and place them on the candle sticks. You must also pick up the keys and use them to open doors. There are some creatures, which makes your mission difficult. Contact with them means sudden death.

sample_screenshots.caption: You can see the progress looking through the window

title: Midnight

description: Jurassic Park II is a platform shooter. The game's story is loosely based on the hit movie Jurassic Park. During the rescue mission flight the helicopter was damaged by Pterodon. The player's task is to find what is needed to survive and repair the helicopter. Various items, such as ammo, tools, extra energy or keys, can be found throughout the game in the satellite dish-shaped objects. The protagonist can use one of four weapons against the dinosaurs and other creatures: pistol, shotgun, flamethrower and rocket launcher. Contact with enemy means a loss of energy.
title: Jurassic Park II

description: Tron: Cykl Świetlny is a side scrolling 'Light Cycle' game for one to two players. The game allows to play against computer or other human player on a split-screen. Each player drives a futuristic vehicle around the game board leaving a solid trail behind them. The main purpose of the game is to cause another player to crash into the trails or the edge of the game area. Both players have eight vehicles at the start. The game ends when one of the players looses all his vehicles. The players receive the points for driving on the board. After each crash of the opponent the player receives extra 100 points. The winner is the player who accumulates more points. At the top of the screen is a map showing the entire game board.
title: Tron: Cykl Świetlny

description:
Atomia is a puzzle-board educational game. The player's goal is to arrange a set of chemical element atoms into a predefined pattern to make certain substances before the time runs out. The name and pattern construction is displayed on the left side of the screen. The element of molecule moves in the indicated direction until it is stopped by another element or the edge of the board. Every few levels the player receives the task of proper arrangement of the tubes with water.

The game offers a total of thirty levels.
title: Atomia

description:
This is a compilation of two games: - Robal is an adaptation of the classical concept of snake games. The player has to guide a worm through a labyrinth. The player must feed the worm to score points and gain access to the next board, however feeding the worm makes it grow longer. The worm loses a life when he bites its own tail. If the worm manages to eat all the fireflies, he will be transferred to the next level.

  • Duch is a side-scrolling arcade game. The player's task is to find all magical items scattered around the maze. Only one item is visible at a time, after collecting it another object appears. Contact with obstacles and enemies takes away some energy. The player can find or buy in the store a few useful items, such as missiles, dynamite, extra energy, oxygen bottle, balloon, fire, money.

sample_screenshots.caption: Ghost may swim or even fly the baloon

title: Robal, Duch

description: U235 is a puzzle board game. The game starts when Galactic Federation sends a secret agent to the planet Umhar. The aim is to neutralize the nuclear threat. To accomplish the mission the player must join together simultaneously two or more of the same elements indicated on the right side of the screen. The element moves in the indicated direction until it is stopped by another element or the edge of the board. The player may use many useful elements, such as mirrors (reflecting laser beam), bombs or detonators (destroying various barriers). However certain elements should not be brought into contact, for example the ball smashes the mirror and the bomb blows up if collides with the board edge.

sample_screenshots.caption: The chest may be used to stop the ball in selected place

title: U235

description: Magic of Words is a puzzle game. The aim is to create a password indicated on the top side of the screen. To accomplish the mission the player must join together the letters in the correct sequence next to each other. The letters and other elements move in the indicated direction until they are stopped by another element or the edge of the board. The task is complicated by the special bricks and a limited number of moves. The elements such as stones may be used as an assistance, for example to destroy a mine field or cover a repulsing brick.

sample_screenshots.caption: Plus brick headinf for a mine field

title: Magic of  Words

description: Starball is a side scrolling arcade game. The aim of the player is to escape of trapped prison by properly using the acquired items. The player controls the direction and the speed of the ball. Flip the ball from the obstacle causing considerable acceleration. With each passing second energy of the ball is constantly decreasing. To top up the energy the player has to get a diamond. The player must avoid closing barriers, fire or swamp fields. To get into evacuation area the player has to get through many closed doors. The correct order of using the found keys is the only way to access the final position. Except of the keys and diamond the player may find few other useful items, such as a time bomb, temporary resistance to fire, canisters and hammers.
title: Starball

description:
Tekblast is an enhanced remake of Dyna Blaster.

The player's task is to make a way through obstacles, eliminate desired number of opponents with bombs and stay alive. During the game several kinds of items may appear. Some of them may help (for example: boots that let you walk faster, walking through the wall, additional bombs) and some of them can make the task more complicated (for example: various blasts, players positions change, lights off).

The game allows up to three players. In 'multiplayer mode' all players fight each other until only one stays alive. In 'single player mode' the player must find the next level entrance before the time runs out. In addition various opponents appear.

sample_screenshots.caption: Ghost and jumping ball - single player mode AI enemies

title: Tekblast

description: Nexus is a simple FPP labyrinth game. The player takes on the role of a rebel against authority and as a punishment ends up on the lowest level of the dungeon. The aim of the player is to find five hearts and the flap to the next level maze. Each movement takes some energy. The decrease of energy to zero means death. The energy is supplemented by collecting hearts. The gameplay screen shows the current chamber and the door to the next areas, level number, remaining lives and energy.

sample_screenshots.caption: Energy level is close to zero

title: Nexus

description: Orto Puzzle is an educational game for kids. The player's task is to choose the correct spelling of Polish words. The correct missing letter need to be selected from different choices indicated at the bottom of the screen by using the up or down cursor keys (or joystick direction). The player has ten seconds to make a decision. The game underlines the missing letters of the word the player needs to decide on. For the appropriate number of correct answers (30) the player gets the reward image of a character from a cartoon (256 colors). On the left side of the screen the game shows the number of answers needed to uncover the reward picture and the good answers indicator, on the right side - the bad answers indicator.

sample_screenshots.caption: On the left - good answers indicator, on the right - bad answers indicator

title: Orto Puzzle

description: Thinker consists of two simple puzzle games played on a 9x9 board: Kostka Rubika (Rubik's Cube) and Układanka (Jigsaw). Both games have the same rules: within five minutes, create the array shown in the second window. In the Rubik's Cube the player moves vertically or horizontally simultaneously three fields (cube rotating), in Jigsaw only one on the single empty space.

sample_screenshots.caption: Soclose, only the empty field is not in the right place

title: Thinker

description: Czarny Orzeł is a first-person shooter. A super secret helicopter named Black Eagle was stolen by the Cuban revolutionaries. The player's task is a diversion in the enemy base preceding the main attack of U.S. commando forces. The player may use two weapons: rifle or heavy grenades. The game takes place on a single level with tasks such as: blowing up the entrance gate, the destruction of stocks of fuel and ammunition, finding the command center of the revolutionaries, taking over the Black Eagle helicopter.
title: Czarny Orzeł

description: Rycerz is a platform game. To become a knight Gregor must past three trials: find a five magic stars in the city and it's underground, find all the daggers in the forest, find six hourglasses in the castle and its dungeons. Gregor does not have a weapon, he can only avoid the animal enemies. Contact with the enemies and static skull means a loss of energy. The young squire may use various found items, such as: apples and drinks (extra energy), dagger (removes a skull), key (open closed crate), heart (extra life) and others. The fall from height means instant death.

sample_screenshots.caption: Starting location, fall from the edge

title: Rycerz

description: Gold Hunter is an action arcade game. Your task is to reach the gold placed in a well. To enter the well you must collect all the items dropped in the labyrinth. To do so you need to find a carrying sack first and then go for the rest of the things. Precise jumping and perfect timing is the only weapon against hostile creatures and flame traps. Contact with the enemies and other obstacles means a loss of life. By collecting the special keys and using them on the magical chests you can gain one time use 30 seconds of extra speed and immortality. An additional difficulty is the time limit. You have only eighteen minutes to reach the well.

sample_screenshots.caption: Carrying sack - you can't carry any items without it

title: Gold Hunter

description:
This is a compilation of two games: - Czaszki is an arcade puzzle board game. The player's task is to place the skulls (the remains of shamans) in the sarcophagus. The player can use a variety of useful items, such as dynamite (blasting), the elixir of force (moving metal grates, anti-spirit protection), key (open door). Fire, stalactites, ghosts, gnome and cannon must be avoided - contact with them means death. In addition the player can collect diamonds for extra points and push some of the objects, such as barrels or stones.

  • Electra is a puzzle board game. The player's task is to connect the electrical equipment with cables. The player must avoid objects destroying the cables, such as electrical short circuit, acid dripping taps, exploding bombs.
title: Czaszki / Electra

description: Jaffar is an action arcade game. Year 1248, Baghdad. Grand Vizier Mohamed al-Rimon kidnapped the princess Miranda and imprisoned her in his castle. In exchange for the release of the Princess Kalih al-Mamun promised hand of the princess and the title of Duke. Jaffar has about an hour to complete the task. The palace consists of nine levels. During the mission Jaffar randomly encounters rats and birds. Contact with them means the loss of energy. Jaffar can trample rats, birds can be only steered clear. The tasks focus on finding objects and using them in the right places in order to reach the harem on the second floor of the palace.

sample_screenshots.caption: Bird and rat are the only enemies in the game

title: Jaffar

description: Zumbaja is a side-view action game similar to Prehistorik. The protagonist of the game is a caveman. The task is to reach all the caves and collect food located there before the time runs out. Opponents such as ghosts, spiders, or sorcerers, and obstacles like spikes or ground holes impede the player character's progress. Every several seconds, a ball will fly out of the right side of the screen. Contact with obstacles and enemies takes away one life. The protagonist uses a club to fight enemies.
title: Zumbaja

description: Sexversi is a computer conversion of the popular two players board game reversi, also known as Othello. You can play against the computer with a choice of four skill levels or against a human player. The computer player is represented by four women. For every winning round the player uncovers one puzzle of a picture with naked opponent. To uncover the whole picture it is necessary to win sixteen rounds. The aim is to fill the board with as many bricks of your own color as possible. On each turn the player places a disc on the 8x8 grid by selecting a location where the opponents discs will become trapped between two of his discs. The enclosed discs are flipped over to the players color. The game ends when there are no empty tiles left. The player with the most discs on board wins the game.
title: Sexversi

description:
5x5 is a puzzle-board game, based on the Polish TV game show 5×5. The player's task is to guess a five letter password in five attempts. The final goal is to guess sixty passwords or earn 25000 in cash with less than 20 failed rounds. After typing each password the game shows the result in the lower row. A letter guessed correctly remains at the right place, a letter that appears in the password but at a different position is highlighted.

The game includes a total of about 500 passwords. Increasing the number of passwords is possible by using the game add-on 5x5 Edytor haseł.
title: 5x5

description: 5x5 Edytor haseł is an add on to 5x5 game. The editor allows you to create an additional set of passwords.
title: 5x5 Edytor haseł

description:
Kolony 2106 is an enhanced remake of Kolony released in 1991. The new version adds music in the intro, outro and the game over screen, improves graphic design and modifies some of the names of entities.

The game was released in Polish, Czech and English languages as downloadable content and a special collector's edition on floppies with a manual, flashlight and bonus CD-ROM.
title: Kolony 2106

description: Lorien's Tomb is a timed puzzle board game similar to Puzznic. The player's task is to remove the mysterious objects blocking the passage to further levels of the pyramid. The obstacles should be disposed of by setting two or more of the same components next to each other before the time runs out. The items can be moved only to the sides and immediately disappear upon contact with another identical element. The player can use the instantly moving (horizontally or vertically) platforms to transport the item to a different place.
title: Lorien's Tomb

description: Riot is a side-scrolling beat'em up game set in a gypsy neighborhood. The character walks to the right and engages the enemies with no particular reason – usually two at a time. The player may punch, kick, attack with the elbow and choke on the ground. The opponents may also use a club. To recover some of the energy the player can relax by genuflection.
title: Riot

description: Inspektor is a detective adventure game. The player assumes the role of a special CIA agent, named Robert Brass. His task is to track down in Poland and eliminate a dangerous terrorist Ennio Baro. The adventure begins at the airport in Poznan, where someone stole his luggage, money, documents and gun. It's midnight, eleventh October 1993, the mission must be finished before noon on the fourteenth October, within 84 hours. The player may use a free taxi to travel between cities. The journeys between cities are by train or by helicopter after illegally forging a government agent ID card. In order to get the necessary funds the player may trade in the marketplace or gamble (three-card monte, slot machine, casino). The money can be spent on informants, hotels, food, travel, useful items or the photographer. All facilities in the game are open at a certain time. The result of the mission depends on a balanced activity distribution, acquisition and proper use of money and collection of information.
title: Inspektor

description:
Wyspa is a text adventure game. The protagonist of the game begins the adventure on a wooden platform on a mysterious island. His goal is to find a way back home. He may carry up to four items. The player will face dozens of locations and many of the puzzles, such as finding clothes.

The text in the game is supplemented by detailed colorful graphics. The player performs actions using text commands. The game accepts complex sentences of a few words with regard to grammar.

The game screen is composed of four fields. At the very top is the bar where the player can read the name of the location. The current area is illustrated with color graphics. Right below is a bar listing the available directions. At the bottom is a part that describes the location and is used to enter commands.
title: Wyspa

description:
Pięć Gówien Eepcha is a text adventure game. The protagonist of the game begins the adventure on a path next to a big tree. His goal is to accomplish the mission given by the prince named Bolo - find five shits of the Eepch animal. The game contains some vulgar language, therefore it is not advisable for young players.

The text in the game is supplemented by colorful graphics. The player performs actions using text commands. The game accepts complex sentences of a couple of words and takes grammar into account. The game provides access to the commands dictionary.

The game screen is made up of two parts. The current area is illustrated with color graphics. Right below is a part that describes the location and is used to enter commands.
title: Pięć Gówien Eepcha

description: Dagobar is a timed puzzle game. Captain Gather returns to save the space disaster. The abandoned base in the Dagobar star system is full of thermonuclear TN3 materials and threatens uncontrolled explosion on a cosmic scale. The player must destroy the materials by combining them in the right order causing an explosive reaction. The player controls a spaceship with missiles. The materials can be pushed down or up and they are moving in the desired direction until encounter a blocking obstacle. The rockets are used to create the materials storage area.
title: Dagobar

description: Robin Wojownik Czasu is a side-scrolling platform game. The graphics are white & black except the points/energy panel, Robin and his pistol shots. The game features four long levels. In each level the player must find two items and reach the teleport device, avoiding a variety of animals (spiders, birds, falcons, lizards and others), moving stones and deadly spikes that take away the life energy. The hero has an infinite amount of ammo and the ability to jump. Each of the four levels is similar, only the arrangement of the components and the wanted items vary.
title: Robin Wojownik Czasu

description: Saper Konstruktor is a level editor for the game Saper.

sample_screenshots.caption: Editor allows to edit all the levels - last level in game, number 64

title: Saper Konstruktor

description:
Robbo Forever is a side-scrolling puzzle solving action game, similar to Boulder Dash and Sokoban. The game is a partially fan made (levels design) commercial enhanced remake of Robbo, released exactly 20 years earlier. The game features a new set of 59 levels, new main menu, title screen and music. The game is available as freeware (atr & xex files) on the developer's site and as a commercial boxed collector's edition.

The player controls a robot, named Robbo. His goal is to collect all the screws on the planet needed to repair the ship, and reach his flying capsule, avoiding alien forms of life and numerous traps.
